text: Thomas P. Gannon (April 5, 1943 â€“ January 10, 2021) was an American politician. He was a Republican member of the Pennsylvania House of Representatives from 1979 to 2006. He was born in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. Gannon died on January 10, 2021 in Upland, Pennsylvania at the age of 77. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2021 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Philadelphia Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
